overview:
Srushti is an application developer and an entrepreneur currently working at a C42 Engineering which he co-founded and where he is the CFO.

C42 Engineering aims to be a self-funded product development firm. As part of the founding team of C42 Engineering, Srushti helped bootstrap an offshore boutique Ruby consulting business, the revenue from which is now being used to fund product development.

Srushti has also spent nearly five years consulting for Fortune 1000 clients as an employee of ThoughtWorks, learning a great deal from some extremely intelligent and capable people.
